Review Guidelines \n\nPlease review the products you have personally experienced. Use at least 300 characters to describe relevant product details. A grammatically correct review will help other users in making their decision. Please avoid direct comparison with other products, profanity, promotional content or personal info

How does Purplle calculate star ratings?

This isn\'t a simple average of the ratings received for the product. We calculate the product\'s ratings based on an algo which weighs the inputs from a Certified Buyer higher than the ratings from other customers. We understand this will help you make a more informed decision while placing an order for a product that you liked.

This is how we do it!!
By clicking on this box, I hereby confirm that I have read this statement

and provide my consent to Manash Lifestyle Private Limited and/or any of its representative(s) and/or third party(ies) appointed by Purplle (collectively referred to as “Purplle”), for (a) capturing and/or storing my image on it’s website/application or database; (b) using such captured/stored image for analysing and communicating any identified skin related concerns that I may have. I further agree and confirm that any communication(s)/recommendation(s) received by Purplle, basis its analysis of my captured/stored image(s), will be solely based on my image captured/stored on Purplle’s website/application or database, and Purplle shall not be liable for any inaccuracy in analysis of any identified skin related concerns or any recommendations (including recommendations for products) made pursuant to such analysis.
